description: Creates a batch of delegations for an assessment in Audit Manager.

parameters.name: createDelegationRequests
parameters.description: The API request to batch create delegations in Audit Manager. (dict) --- A collection of attributes that's used to create a delegation for an assessment in Audit Manager. comment (string) --- A comment that's related to the delegation request. controlSetId (string) --- The unique identifier for the control set. roleArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. roleType (string) --- The type of customer persona.

nested_params.name: comment
nested_params.description: A comment that's related to the delegation request.

nested_params.name: controlSetId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the control set.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: delegations
nested_items.description: The delegations that are associated with the assessment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the delegation.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was last updated.

nested_items.name: controlSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control set that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: comment
nested_items.description: The comment that's related to the delegation.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that created the delegation.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors that the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API returned.

nested_items.name: createDelegationRequest
nested_items.description: The API request to batch create delegations in Audit Manager.

nested_items.name: comment
nested_items.description: A comment that's related to the delegation request.

nested_items.name: controlSetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the control set.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API returned.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API returned.
